about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Pack 208: Vaults Lvl 2

Jealous of their brethren’s success, another band of marauding monsters has assembled for your command! This assembly of abominations has 21 abyssal assistants! Green skin ghouls lumber into action alongside their massive maggoty minion and scampering spidery summons to surprise your unwary adventurers! Assemble an array of abominations and make your next encounter an ghastly success!
